A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The most frustrating installment to date.  The film has all of the elements of a good movie:  acting\, dialogue\, cinematography\, etc.  What it lacks is a cohesive plot giving meaning to anything that goes up onscreen.  Big things happen but they happen in a void without making any sense.  The Force Awakens had flaws but at least it made sense in terms of the story it was trying to tell.  This told us a story no one really needed.   The entire resistance/Canto Blight storyline seemed out of place and only used to give the non-jedi characters something to do during Rey's \"training\".  The may not be the worst movie in the Star Wars saga but it is definitely the most dissappointing
